author: Anonymous
title: Feeling overwhelmed after delivery
body: I just had my baby a few weeks ago and I thought I would be overjoyed, but honestly I just feel overwhelmed and exhausted. Is this normal? I feel so guilty for not being happier.

thread.author: Anonymous
thread.comment: You're not alone. The first few weeks are the hardest. It gets better!

thread.author: Anonymous
thread.comment: This is so common. In our culture, there's so much pressure to be perfect, but it's okay to feel this way.

author: Anonymous
title: Sutkeri restrictions making me feel trapped
body: My family is very strict about the sutkeri rules and I haven't been able to leave my room for weeks. I appreciate their care, but I'm starting to feel really isolated and depressed. How can I talk to them about this without being disrespectful?

thread.author: Anonymous
thread.comment: I went through the same thing. I tried explaining to my family that some fresh air was important for my mental health.

author: Anonymous
title: Mother-in-law says I'm being dramatic
body: I tried to explain to my mother-in-law that I think I might have postpartum depression, and she told me I was just being dramatic and looking for attention. I feel so hurt and misunderstood.

thread.author: Anonymous
thread.comment: Your feelings are valid. It's hard when family doesn't understand.
